title: Noam Chomsky: 'The Left Never Accepted Liberalism's View Of Democracy Until Recently'
description:
When Katie's Wednesday night co-host Nando Vila (https://twitter.com/nandorvila) asks Noam Chomsky if The Left has reduced democracy to the act of voting, Chomsky laments: "The Left has never accepted the Establishment view of democracy, until now."  And it sounds like Chomsky's dog is disturbed by this political development as well.
